mapper.select: select user_id, id, password, user_name, phone_number, nickname, user_profile, birthday, created_at, updated_at from users where order by user_id
select u.user_id, u.id, u.password, u.nickname, u.email from users u left outer join delete_users d on u.user_id = d.user_id where u.id = #{id} and d.user_id is null
mapper.insert: insert into users values(users_id_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{email}, #{password}, #{userName}, #{phoneNumber}, #{nickname}, #{profileImage}, #{birthday}, sysdate, sysdate)
